named-query.name: TomatoReview.list
named-query.description: list all tomato review. Show firstly last created.
named-query.query: FROM TomatoReview tomatoReview order by tomatoReview.tomato.startTime desc

named-query.name: TomatoDaoImpl.list
named-query.description: list all tomato. Show firstly last created.
named-query.query: FROM Tomato tomato order by tomato.startTime desc
